item.title: Harris Dickinson Talks Directorial Ambitions, Working Up the Courage to Ask ‘Babygirl’ Co-Star Nicole Kidman: “What Was Stanley Kubrick Like?”
item.description: “You can’t start with that. You have to get there slowly,” the actor-director joked at a San Sebastian Film Festival event on Saturday, where he spoke with his producing partner Archie Pearch.
